description.english: Obtain the Bodhisattva Statue.

description.tchinese: 獲得六葬菩薩金像

description.tchinese: 使用羅盤線索解開謎題

description.vietnamese: Dùng manh mối la bàn để giải đố

displayName.thai: แฟชั่นไอคอน

description.english: Burn 3 costumes for the High Priest to wear.

description.tchinese: 為大巫賢換上三種不同的裝扮

description.english: Complete the game without any hints or skipping mini games.
description.schinese: 不查看提示和不跳过小游戏的情况下通关游戏
description.tchinese: 不看提示且不跳過小遊戲的情況下通關遊戲

displayName.thai: มาสเตอร์เกมดนตรี

description.english: In Challenge Mode, all songs have been fully played through once.
description.schinese: 在挑战模式中，所有的歌曲都完整弹奏过一次
description.tchinese: 在挑戰模式中，完整彈奏所有歌曲一次

description.japanese: 挑戦モードで、すべての曲を1度最初から最後まで演奏する
description.vietnamese: Trong chế độ khiêu chiến, biểu diễn hoàn chỉnh toàn bộ ca khúc 1 lần
